Pre-Game Insights: Adley Rutschman and the Baltimore Orioles will see Zebby Matthews starting for the Minnesota Twins on Saturday at 7:15 PM ET on FOX.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins will call on Matthews (1-3) to make his ninth start of the season. He is 1-3 with a 5.71 ERA and 38 Ks in 34 2/3 innings pitched.
Others: Adley Rutschman has a hit in 93 of 146 games this season, with multiple hits in 38 of them.
In 11.6% of his games this season, he has gone yard (17 of 146).
Rutschman has scored at least one run in 36.3% of his games this season (53 of 146), with two or more runs scored in 12 of those contests (8.2%).
In 47 of 146 games this season (32.2%), he has driven in a run, and 20 of those games (13.7%) included a performance that produced two or more RBI.
